name: Quested
description:
Play as a slime, defending yourself and your kind from the invading RPG players. They seek nothing but to destroy your way of life in their selfish and merciless efforts to take all of your XP. 

Your weapons, both a stick and your sheer determination, will help you as you fend off the hoards of enemies. 

This game was made for the Shenanijam 2018, it was submitted under the JDE Shenanijam Bundle, try out the bundle for some other fun games made by cool people. https://jde.itch.io/jde-shenanijam-bundle
